Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
public class GameHandler extends Object
The class Gamehandler is the core of the controller, its role is to manage the turn in the game, the current player, the legit action for each player and phase, the game is divided in phases, every phase has a set of permitted action, if the action is permitted and the sender of the action is the current player the method execute is call, execute is a method inside every message that modify the game, execute return an object called update that permit the gamehandler to refresh the state of the GameHandler (turn, phase)

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(Message message)
    The method execute take the message arrived from the users, check if the sender of the action is the current player, check if the action is legit in that phase of the turn and then call the method execute of message, every message has an override of the method execute of the super class Message, in every message the execute method modify tha game in a different way and return an update object, the update object id analyzed by the execute method of gamehandler to refresh the state of the turn and phase

    • execute

      public void execute(Message message) throws IllegalActionException, IllegalMoveException, NoActiveCardException, NoIslandException, NoPlayerException, NoCharacterSelectedException, OverflowCardException
      The method execute take the message arrived from the users, check if the sender of the action is the current player, check if the action is legit in that phase of the turn and then call the method execute of message, every message has an override of the method execute of the super class Message, in every message the execute method modify tha game in a different way and return an update object, the update object id analyzed by the execute method of gamehandler to refresh the state of the turn and phase
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that will be checked and eventually executed
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - is the exception thrown when the current player try to do an action not permitted in the current phase
      IllegalMoveException - is the exception thrown when is not possible to use a card
      NoActiveCardException - is the exception thrown when there is no an active card and someone try to use it
      NoIslandException - is the exception thrown when is requested an island that doesn't exist
      NoPlayerException - is the exception thrown when is requested a player that doesn't exist
      NoCharacterSelectedException - is the exception thrown when in the method usePower in game someone try to use a character with a wrong index
      OverflowCardException - if there is no such Card in the Player's Hand

      Game getGame()

      public List<String> getPlayers()
      Method to return the players in the fame
      Returns:
      a list of String with the nicknames of the players
